definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: Evacuees from the area around the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Plant receive a meal at an evacuation center in Namie.
sentences.chinese: 福島第一核電站附近被疏散人員在疏散中心接受配餐。

sentences.english: We know how to prepare meals for Moslems.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道怎樣爲穆斯林教徒準備配餐。

sentences.english: And everyone knows that an omelette can be eaten at any meal.
sentences.chinese: 這就是大家所熟悉的，蛋卷可以與任何食物配餐來喫。

sentences.english: This text is the problem about the nutrition compound food.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述的是關於營養配餐的問題。

sentences.english: Students scrambled to the Diet and urinated on the doors.
sentences.chinese: 學生們爭奪配餐，在門廊上撒尿。

sentences.english: Break-time snacks in this primary school are created by dietitians.
sentences.chinese: 這個小學的課間餐都是請營養配餐員設計調配出來的。

sentences.english: The conception and category of Chinese nutritional diet were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了中式營養配餐的概念及範疇。

sentences.english: Primarily for use in airport catering trucks and other vehicles and gas cylinders.
sentences.chinese: 主要用於機場配餐車和氣瓶運輸車等。

sentences.english: In the end, the classification of the Chinese nutritional diet industrialization equipment was summarized.
sentences.chinese: 對中式營養配餐工業化設備進行了分類概述。

sentences.english: Our graduates will mainly take the posts of food delivering in the aviation food distribution industry.
sentences.chinese: 學生畢業後主要面向航空配餐業的送機崗位。
